title: Solving the biofouling problem of uranium extraction from seawater by plasma technology
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00226A, Paper
Xue Zhang, Dadong Shao
Plasma treatment can effectively kill microorganisms in seawater and solve the marine biofouling problem of U(VI) extraction.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
